name: Eren Yaeger
creatorcomment: Eren Yeager is a complex protagonist in Attack on Titan who transforms from a determined soldier seeking vengeance against Titans to a morally ambiguous figure willing to take extreme measures to protect his people

data.name: Eren Yaeger
